titleStmt.title: The best name on earth together with severall other sermons / lately preached at St. Brides and in other places by T. Fuller.
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the use and benefit of William Byron, Gent.,

notesStmt.note: Each work has separate t.p. and paging.
Reproduction of original in the Emanuel College Library, Cambridge University.
The worst of evils (33 p.) -- The snare broken (23 p.) -- Strange justice (45 p.)
